choices: they make him lick there feet
out there shoes on his nose
1.content: Goro Akechi... the one who "killed" Joker.... he thought he could get away with this... but he was wrong... he was so wrong... Ren and Ryuji waited for the perfect opportunity for revenge... and that day came. Akechi was on his way home, but to his bad luck Ryuji and Ren already waited for him. Sneaking behind him Ryuji grabbed Akechi hardly, dragging him into an alley and tieing him up together with Ren. Ren and Ryuji managed somehow to drag the tied up Akechi to Ren's Room without that the owner of Cafe Leblanc, Sojiro Sakura, noticed it. Ryuji stayed upstairs with Akechi quietly so that they don't get caught. Later in the night when Sojiro locked up the door for the Cafe, Ren returned back to Ryuji and Akechi. The time for revenge had came! Ryuji untied Akechi, pulled him hardly up and then started to beat him up pretty badly together with Ren. It took like 20 minutes till Akechi lay on the ground, crying. Ren and Ryuji stood above him, taunting and laughing at him. Both pulled their shoes and socks off and rubbed their feet all around Akechi's Face. Akechi layed there, getting humiliated the two boys he wanted to get rid off... he thought it's all just a bad nightmare... but he is wrong... from now on he will be the personal punchbag and footslave for Ren and Ryuji... his fate was sealed.
1.title: Start

info.brief_description: Ren and Ryuji have kidnapped Akechi tied him up in the attic and torture him
info.description: From now on Akechi will be the personal punchbag and foot slave for Ren and Ryuji...
